external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.

description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has ensured web servers in a victim environment are Internet accessible before copying tools or malware to it.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)
